title: Multi-Tower Multi-Interest Recommendation with User Representation Repel
abstract: arXiv:2403.05122v1 Announce Type: cross  Abstract: In the era of information overload, the value of recommender systems has been profoundly recognized in academia and industry alike. Multi-interest sequential recommendation, in particular, is a subfield that has been receiving increasing attention in recent years. By generating multiple-user representations, multi-interest learning models demonstrate superior expressiveness than single-user representation models, both theoretically and empirically. Despite major advancements in the field, three major issues continue to plague the performance and adoptability of multi-interest learning methods, the difference between training and deployment objectives, the inability to access item information, and the difficulty of industrial adoption due to its single-tower architecture. translated_title: 具有用户表示排斥的多塔多兴趣推荐
translated_abstract: 在信息过载的时代，学术界和工业界都深刻认识到推荐系统的价值。特别是多兴趣序列推荐是近年来受到越来越多关注的一个子领域。通过生成多用户表示，多兴趣学习模型在理论上和经验上都比单用户表示模型具有更强的表达能力。尽管该领域取得了重大进展，但仍存在三个主要问题困扰着多兴趣学习方法的性能和可采用性，即训练和部署目标之间的差异、无法访问商品信息以及由于其单塔架构而难以工业采用。我们通过提出一种具有用户表示排斥的新型多塔多兴趣框架来解决这些挑战。通过跨多个大规模实验结果，我们证明了我们的方法的有效性。
tldr: 提出了一种具有用户表示排斥的新型多塔多兴趣框架，解决了多兴趣学习方法面临的训练和部署目标差异、无法访问商品信息以及难以工业采用等问题。
en_tdlr: Proposed a novel multi-tower multi-interest framework with user representation repel, addressing the challenges in multi-interest learning methods including differences between training and deployment objectives, inability to access item information, and difficulty of industrial adoption.
